form.song: Your favourite song for the wedding

transport-going.title: Transport
transport-going.desc: Everything will start at the church, but to arrive there, you will need transportation. We have a bus route that will cover several places; please select your pickup point:

church.title: Church
church.desc:
Our first stop will be the ceremony, which will take place at Sant√≠simo Corpus Christi church at 6 p.m. It is located at Camino de Perales 4, Las Rozas, Madrid.

*Don't be late because Laura is very punctual!

banquet.title: Banquet
banquet.desc:
Afterwards we will enjoy good music, food, and drinks at Los Arcos de Fuentepizarro. This estate is located at Ctra Guadarrama al Escorial, km 3.400, San Lorenzo del Escorial, Madrid.

*If you took the bus, it will bring you there, too.

transport-return.title: Transport
transport-return.desc: The party will finish between 5 a.m. and 6 a.m. But if you wish to leave sooner, there will also be buses at 1 a.m. (after starting the party), and 3.30 a.m. Just like on your way here, the bus will stop at several places; check them out!

accomodation.title: Accomodations
accomodation.desc: If you would like sleep a little bit after the party, we recommend some places in El Escorial and in Madrid. Please check them out:

honeymoon.title: Honeymoon
honeymoon.desc:
We are going to New Zealand! And we would like to visit several points of interest. We have the flights and two backpacks; would you like to help us with our route?

Below you will find a list of activities we would like to enjoy in this country. It will be the first time we visit it (and we think it will be the last‚Äîit is the antipode of Spain!).

If you are interested in helping us with any of them, please add your email in the field at the bottom of the list. We will get back to you with instructions.

*We have designed a possible route‚Äîtake a look.
honeymoon.disclaimer: Choose the option(s) you want and help with what you consider, it is not needed to pay the whole activity or expense.

renting.title: üöê ¬∑ Rent a van
renting.desc: We would like to visit the whole country (both islands), so we need transportation.

coromandel.title: üö§ ¬∑ Kayaking at Coromandel reserve
coromandel.desc: Enjoying practicing kayak in the Coromandel Marine Reserve.

franz-josef.title: ‚õ∞ ¬∑ Franz Josef Glaciar
franz-josef.desc: Must visit at one of the amazing New Zealand glaciars.

ferry.title: ‚õ¥ ¬∑ Ferry between the two islands
ferry.desc: We will need to take a ferry in order to cross the country.

hobbiton.title: üé¨ ¬∑ Hobbiton visit
hobbiton.desc: Do you know where Hobbit or Lord of the Rings was filmed? There we want to go :D.

milford-sound.title: üõ≥ ¬∑ Milford Sound cruise
milford-sound.desc: Cruise over the Milford Sound fiord waters.

abel-tasman.title: üèû ¬∑ Abel Tasman visit
abel-tasman.desc: Kayak or walk through the Abel Tasman National Park.

maori.title: üç≤ ¬∑ Maor√≠ dinner
maori.desc: Enjoying a traditional Maor√≠ food at Rotorua, cooked in a H√£ngi way.

campervan-park.title: ‚õ∫ ¬∑ Campervan park
campervan-park.desc: It is not allowed to park the campervan wherever you want for sleeping, so we need to choose a campervan-park or camping for each night.

oamaru.title: üêß ¬∑ Penguin sightseeing
oamaru.desc: We really love penguins, and we would like to visit them in Oamaru and adopt one. Check the web!

kaikoura.title: üê≥ ¬∑ Whales in Kaikorua
kaikoura.desc: We can't miss the oportunity to see the whales swimming in the Kaikorua waters.

waitomo.title: üêõ ¬∑ Waitomo glowworm caves
waitomo.desc: There are several glowworm caves in New Zealand, but this is the most famous one.

auckland.title: üåÜ ¬∑ Dinner in Auckland
auckland.desc: Dinner for two in a skyscrapper with the best views in Auckland.

petrol.title: ‚õΩÔ∏è ¬∑ Petrol
petrol.desc: According to our plans, we travel around 2,600 km in the south island and 900 km in the north island.

contact.title: Confirmation
contact.desc: Time to confirm your attendance! Add as many attendees as you wish, specifying the name and if s/he has an allergy or is vegetarian.
contact.other-contact: Or if you prefer to call or write us directly.
